title: Can't cast from Pixel 3 to Win 10.
content: I am trying to cast from my Pixel to my Win 10 laptop.  Following this guide:https://www.techjunkie.com/guide/google-pixel-3-how-to-mirror-my-screen-to-my-tv-or-pc/.  My laptop will not show up as a device I can cast to.  It works for a fellow employee on his Samsung S9+.  He just chooses cast and my laptop shows right up as an option.
